TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_u_belbel, title = u_belbel, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_belbel} }

S.FORM: u palu' nu da'dac palasepaten u tungus nu tapuku- misanga'ay tu tuud a paudipay u lala' – u lala' a paudipay u kawanan- u tuas atu misatahaway a pinacadan u kawili ; sakaudip a paudipay pahcekan ku awk i lala` mahida u belbel kapah mukawih tu bali muladay tu tuas

o palo' no da'dac palasepaten o tongos no tapoko- misanga'ay to tood a paodipay o lala' – o lala' a paodipay o kawanan- o toas ato misatahaway a pinacadan o kawili ; sakaodip a paodipay pahcekan ko awk i lala` mahida o belbel kapah mokawih to bali moladay to toas
